oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hand-tinted tintype of Pvt. Milo G. Stone with 2 soldiers eating hardtack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Milo G. Stone, Co. B, 143 Pa. Inf., USA. Posed for this studio shot with 2 other soldiers in frock coats, likely early in the war. Note the painted background and the soldiers' hand-tinted cheeks. Soldiers are posed drinking coffee and eating hard-tack an example of which Pvt. Stone preserved in fran038.
